item.title: Lower Lobe Cargo A/C Cabin Shutoff Valve(s) – Valves Secured Open

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated valve is secured open.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Carriage of animals and perishables in associated cargo compartment is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard Lower Lobe Cargo Cond Air Flow Rate selector "HIGH RATE INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.title: LOWER LOBE CARGO A/C CABIN SHUTOFF VALVE(S)

numlitem.para: For aft valve, open the P414 panel LOWER AFT CARGO AIR COND VLVS circuit breaker.
For forward valve, open the P414 panel LOWER FORWARD CARGO AIR COND VLVS circuit breaker.
Secure discrepant Lower A/C Cargo Forward Shutoff Valve or lower Aft A/C Cabin Shutoff Valve in the open position.

Locate Forward A/C Cargo Cabin Shutoff Valve (Pack 3) in the right body wheel well; STA 1261, WL 167, RBL 28. Manually position valve in the open position. Remove, cap, and stow valve electrical connector.
Locate Aft A/C Cargo Cabin Shutoff Valve (Pack 2) under main deck floor; STA 1245, WL 180, LBL 17. Manually position valve in the open position. Remove, cap, and stow valve electrical connector.
Position the LOWER LOBE CARGO COND AIR FLOW RATE selector to OFF or LOW on the overhead Maintenance panel (P461).
Close LOWER FORWARD CARGO AIR COND VLVS and LOWER AFT CARGO AIR COND VLVS circuit breakers on the P414 panel.
In the cockpit the Status message ZONE TEMP will remain displayed.

graphic.title: LOWER LOBE CARGO A/C CABIN SHUTOFF VALVE(S)
